content.question: Which of the following sources should be examined in a study to determine the impact of a geologic source on levels of <math alttext="C O 2" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>CO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mstyle></math> in the atmosphere?

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Describe an aspect of a research method, design, and/or measure used.
